TopicTitle: Tracking Station view, objects list, selecting "destroy" and pressing "confirm" does nothing

Articles.Content:
Pressing "destroy" in the list (left pane) and then "confirm" in the confirmation dialog does nothing.

 

 

BTW, having that hash there is even funnier than "DEFAULT-NAME-#"... The proper way to name debris would be (on staging or collision) to instantiate a name from OriginalVesselName + " " + PartName, it would result in nice self-explanatory names such as "Debris: DragonX Fairing" or "Debris: Soyuz Booster" etc.
